name: NKM Nemzeti Közművek Zrt.
goal: We are a state owned enterprise operating in the Hungarian power and natural gas retail markets. We are in the process of transformation to convert the company from a utility company into a home service provider through implementing new technologies and innovative solutions.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: European Union Third Energy Package and European Union Winter Package
